initial_point_set.description: Set to use for initial points. 0 - Read from SaveVertices, 1 - Monte Carlo, 2 - Generalized Spiral, 3 - Fibbonaci Grid

number_of_generated_points.description: If initial_point_set is set to anything other than 0, this defines the number of points that will be generated.

maximum_iterations.description: Maximum iterations to perform unless convergence criteria is met.

iterations_per_restart.description: Number of iterations to perform between writing restart files.

iterations_without_projection.description: The number of iterations our of maximum_iterations that will not have a boundary projection applied.

iterations_with_variable_projection.description: Number of iterations to scale boundary projection from off to on over.

triangle_divisions.description: Number of subdivisions to perform on a triangle during integration. Subdivides a triangle into four triangles.

bisections.description: Number of times the point set will be bisected after converging.

convergence_check.description: Criteria to use for convergence check. 0 - Max Iterations, 1 - Average movement, 2 - Maximum movement

convergence_criteria.description: Convergence criteria to use when convergence_check is 1 or 2.

quadrature_rule.description: Quadrature rule to use for triangle integration. 0 - Circumcenter, 1 - Vertex, 2 - Midpoint, 3 - 7 Point, 4 - 13 Point, 5 - 19 Point. Default is Circumcenter.

delaunay_triangle_center.description: Point to use for the center of Delaunay triangles when dividing for integration. 0 - Circumcenter, 1 - Barycenter.

sort_method.description: Method to use for sorting point set into regions. 0 - Dot product, 1 - Voronoi sort.

file_io_mode.description: Mode to use for I/O. 0 - ASCII, 1 - NetCDF, 2 - Both.

restart_file_handling.description: Method for handling restart files. 0 - Overwrite old files, 1 - Retain old files.

max_annealing_percent.possible_values: Any positive real number between 0 and 1
max_annealing_percent.description: Percent to use when performing simulated annealing. Given as a fraction where 1.0 is 100%.

annealing_frequency.description: Number of iterations between simulated annealing applications. 0 means no annealing.

max_annealing_iterations.description: The maximum number of iterations annealing should be allowed to happen on.

anneal_when_stagnant.description: Forces an annealing whenever convergence criteria becomes stagnant. 0 - off, 1 - Ave, 2 - Max

anneal_only_non_hexagons.description: When performing annealing, 0 - Anneal all cell centers, 1 - anneal non-hexagons.
